sen.j: 倭姫王（やまとひめのおおきみ、生没年不詳）は、飛鳥時代の皇族。
sen.e: Yamatohime no Okimi (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of the imperial family who lived in the Asuka period.

sen.cmt: imperial family→Imperial Family と修正しました。
sen.e: Yamatohime no Okimi (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of the imperial family who lived in the Asuka period.

sen.j: 舒明天皇の孫で、古人大兄皇子の娘。
sen.e: Her grandfather was the Emperor Jomei, and her father was Furuhito no Oe no Miko.
Her grandfather was the Emperor Jomei, and her father was Furuhito no Oe no Miko.

sen.j: 天智天皇の皇后であるが、子には恵まれなかった。
sen.e: She was the empress of the Emperor Tenchi, but she didn't have any children.

sen.cmt: didn't→did not と修正しました。
sen.e: She was the empress of the Emperor Tenchi, but she did not have any children.

sen.j: 天智7年（668年）2月、大后となる。
sen.e: In March, 668, she became an okisaki (an empress).
sen.cmt: 天智7年（668年）2月は西暦668年3月22日となるようです。http://maechan.net/kanreki/
sen.e: In March, 668, she became the empress dowager.
sen.cmt: okisaki (an empress)→the empress dowager と修正しました。（太后＝皇太后の称）
sen.e: In March, 668, she became the empress dowager.

sen.j: 天智天皇が病に倒れた際、天武天皇は、倭姫王が即位し、弘文天皇が太政大臣として摂政を執ることを進言したとされる。
sen.e: It is said that when the Emperor Tenchi fell ill, the Emperor Tenmu advised that Yamatohime no Okimi should ascend the throne and the Emperor Kobun should become Daijo-daijin (Grand Minister) to serve as sessho (emperor's chief advisor).

sen.e: It is said that when the Emperor Tenchi fell ill, the Emperor Tenmu advised that Yamatohime no Okimi to ascend the throne, and the Emperor Kobun to become Daijo-daijin (Grand Minister) to serve as sessho (emperor's chief advisor).

sen.j: また、天智天皇崩御後に、実際に倭姫王による即位または称制があったとする説もある。
sen.e: One theory has it that Yamatohime no Okimi in fact ascended the throne or undertook shosei (ruling without official accession to the Chrysanthemum Throne) after the Emperor Tenchi died.

sen.j: 天智天皇の危篤、崩御の際に詠んだ歌4首が万葉集に収められている。
sen.e: Four of her waka (a traditional Japanese poem of thirty-one syllables) composed while the Emperor Tenchi was in critical condition and on his death are selected in Manyoshu (Collection of Ten Thousand Leaves).
